example.title: Red Velvet Chocolate Cake
example.description: A truly decadent southern classic: two rich layers of red chocolate cake, fill and covered with the finest, pure cream cheese frosting, and then garnished with white chocolate sprinkles around the sides. Includes a Chocolate Occasion Plaque, matching Greeting Card and is packaged in an elegant gift box!
